plan.title: CTF Challenge
p1: In the area of cybersecurity, CTFs have become competitions to demonstrate expertise in attacking (or defending) computer resources. The essence of a CTS is puzzle solving. The challeges are created by and for people who like solving puzzles. One aspect potentially frustrating to beginners is that the goal of the challege may not be spelled out. Take that in stride.
